title: Met Internal Compiler Error When Building v8 crate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
When I was installing deno through cargo the bug pops, and do not know what happend due to my limited knownledge. Hope it be solved soon. ### Code ```Powershell cargo install deno ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0 (fc594f156 2023-01-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: fc594f15669680fa70d255faec3ca3fb507c3405 commit-date: 2023-01-24 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.67.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ```
Error output & Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'range end index 16915825 out of range for slice of length 16813760', compiler\rustc_codegen_ssa\src\back\archive.rs:249:37 Compiling serde_v8 v0.82.0 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffb70869de2 - ::fmt::h21483e943f4ad906 1: 0x7ffb708a5d0b - core::fmt::write::h8f4c7586035b3d2b 2: 0x7ffb7085ca2a - ::fmt::hc1ea61cfd970f48a 3: 0x7ffb70869b2b - std::sys::common::alloc::realloc_fallback::h02615bcb1723d762 4: 0x7ffb7086d459 - std::panicking::default_hook::h97aed9cc52878577 5: 0x7ffb7086d0db - std::panicking::default_hook::h97aed9cc52878577 6: 0x7ffb63c70bed - rustc_driver[708e54b233d52623]::describe_lints 7: 0x7ffb7086ddc0 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h5481405004a2be3e 8: 0x7ffb7086db1e - ::get::h8f75b6be7202b578 9: 0x7ffb7086aadf - ::fmt::h21483e943f4ad906 10: 0x7ffb7086d7d0 - rust_begin_unwind 11: 0x7ffb708dbb85 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::hf042f640ecb61b9a 12: 0x7ffb708a9257 - ::fmt::h2e60d15bee213940 13: 0x7ffb708dc0a9 - core::slice::index::slice_end_index_len_fail::hb8ff45395416954c 14: 0x7ffb62050dd2 - ::build 15: 0x7ffb62059ff0 - rustc_codegen_ssa[390bf04304980c0]::back::link::link_binary 16: 0x7ffb6149bf28 - ::link 17: 0x7ffb61469770 - ::link 18: 0x7ffb6143d3db - ::fmt 19: 0x7ffb6142d176 - 20: 0x7ffb61422b7d - 21: 0x7ffb7087fe9c - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::ha5690b04bc8c8d7a 22: 0x7ffc1a3326bd - BaseThreadInitThunk 23: 0x7ffc1b08dfb8 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.67.0 (fc594f156 2023-01-24) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type rlib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debug-assertions=off note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `v8` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... thread 'rustc' panicked at 'range end index 16915825 out of range for slice of length 16813760', compiler\rustc_codegen_ssa\src\back\archive.rs:249:37 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffb70869de2 - ::fmt::h21483e943f4ad906 1: 0x7ffb708a5d0b - core::fmt::write::h8f4c7586035b3d2b 2: 0x7ffb7085ca2a - ::fmt::hc1ea61cfd970f48a 3: 0x7ffb70869b2b - std::sys::common::alloc::realloc_fallback::h02615bcb1723d762 4: 0x7ffb7086d459 - std::panicking::default_hook::h97aed9cc52878577 5: 0x7ffb7086d0db - std::panicking::default_hook::h97aed9cc52878577 6: 0x7ffb63c70bed - rustc_driver[708e54b233d52623]::describe_lints 7: 0x7ffb7086ddc0 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h5481405004a2be3e 8: 0x7ffb7086db1e - ::get::h8f75b6be7202b578 9: 0x7ffb7086aadf - ::fmt::h21483e943f4ad906 10: 0x7ffb7086d7d0 - rust_begin_unwind 11: 0x7ffb708dbb85 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::hf042f640ecb61b9a 12: 0x7ffb708a9257 - ::fmt::h2e60d15bee213940 13: 0x7ffb708dc0a9 - core::slice::index::slice_end_index_len_fail::hb8ff45395416954c 14: 0x7ffb62050dd2 - ::build 15: 0x7ffb62059ff0 - rustc_codegen_ssa[390bf04304980c0]::back::link::link_binary 16: 0x7ffb6149bf28 - ::link 17: 0x7ffb61469770 - ::link 18: 0x7ffb6143d3db - ::fmt 19: 0x7ffb6142d176 - 20: 0x7ffb61422b7d - 21: 0x7ffb7087fe9c - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::ha5690b04bc8c8d7a 22: 0x7ffc1a3326bd - BaseThreadInitThunk 23: 0x7ffc1b08dfb8 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.67.0 (fc594f156 2023-01-24) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type rlib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `v8` ```
